name: codertubes
description: A MEVN portfolio CRUD SPA web app showing a curated selection of web development video tutorials on YouTube.com.  Technologies used are Vue.js and Bulma CSS framework on the front-end, MondoDB database, and Node.js and Express on the backend.
author: Ryan Hunter | GitHub handle: SystemsVanguard | email: ryan@ryanHunter.org | Location: Toronto ON Canada
